body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go          Ohio's National Park Service Sites  If you're in Ohio and you have a few days to spare after your visit to the National Aviation Heritage Area sites, consider visiting Ohio's national park sites.  Ohio has eight total National Park Service sites with three of them located within 100 minutes from the Dayton area.  Learn more about Ohio's national parks and experience your national parks in Ohio!
title: National Aviation Heritage Area: Places To Go
